ace.platform

Class ReflectionPropertyHelper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ace.Ace
      • ace.LocalExceptionHandler
        • ace.platform.ReflectionPropertyHelper<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExceptionsHandler, Initializable

    public class ReflectionPropertyHelper<T>
extends LocalExceptionHandler
implements Initializable
    Useful property helper class allowing access to a getter/setter pair in a silent way (handling exceptions).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ace.LocalExceptionHandler

        _exceptionsMonitor

      • Fields inherited from class ace.Ace
